dt: {bc}a member of a special regiment or corps formerly armed with grenades
{bc}any of various deep-sea fishes (family Macrouridae) that are related to the cods and have an elongate tapering body and compressed pointed tail

shortdef: a soldier who carries and throws grenades
a member of a special regiment or corps formerly armed with grenades
any of various deep-sea fishes (family Macrouridae) that are related to the cods and have an elongate tapering body and compressed pointed tail
